title: PT 1: She Wants To Rekindle Her Friendship With A Woman Who's Dating Her Ex?!
description:
She and her best friend stopped talking to one another years ago...for good reason. She was upset once she found out her friend was dating her ex-husband. Because of this, they mutually ended their friendship.
But now, our listener feelings have changed. She missed her friend and wants to rekindle their friendship. Is her former friend willing to do the same?
We have answers...
